query.statement:
SELECT '' AS CHK, CASE WHEN B.STATE = '1' OR B.STATE = '2' OR B.STATE = '3' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS FLAG, 'N' AS DEL, 'U' AS CHECK, B.PSPID, (SELECT X.ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = B.MANDT AND X.POSID = B.PSPID) AS ZSITE_NM, B.WRK_HOGI, B.HKONT, B.WRKTX, B.GUBUN, B.BLDAT, -- B.BCDATE, B.KOSTL, B.INSDT, --CASE WHEN B.CNFDT = 00000000 or B.CNFDT = '' THEN '' ELSE B.CNFDT END AS CNFDT, B.CNSDT, B.CNFDT , B.INSLFN, B.INAME1, B.WRKPNO, (SELECT NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0122 WHERE UNAME = B.WRKPNO) AS WRKPNM, B.W_INST, B.WRKLFN, LF.NAME1 AS WRKLFN_NM, B.STATE, C.ITEMNO, CASE WHEN C.ITEMCD = 'I0500' OR C.ITEMCD = 'J2100' OR C.ITEMCD = 'K1000' OR C.ITEMCD = 'L1000' THEN C.ITEMTX ELSE C.ITEMCD END AS ITEMTX, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0117D WHERE CODE = C.ITEMCD) AS ITEMTX_NM, SUBSTR(VALUE(C.ITEMCD,'00000'),1,3)||'00' AS T_ITEMTX, C.UNIT, C.CAPA, C.QUAN, C.WRBTR *100 AS WRBTR, 0.0 AS S_WRBTR, 'N' AS INSERT_INDC, B.TWBTR *100 AS S_WRBTR2,
'' AS TEXT, '' AS ITEMTX2, -- CASE WHEN INT(B.SEQNO) AS SEQNO, INT(B.SEQNO) AS SEQNO, '' AS SEQNO2 , (CASE WHEN B.STATE = '3' THEN 'F2' ELSE B.FGBN END) AS FGBN, VALUE((SELECT SUM(X.TWBTR) *100 FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0117 AS X WHERE B.MANDT = X.MANDT AND B.PSPID = X.PSPID AND B.HKONT = X.HKONT AND B.GUBUN = X.GUBUN), 0 ) AS SUM_TWBTR, VALUE( CASE WHEN B.HKONT = '0053037210' THEN (SELECT SUM(M.EQME98) * 100 FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS XX ON XX.MANDT = M.MANDT AND XX.POSID = M.PSPID AND XX.POSID_1 = M.POSID WHERE XX.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND XX.POSID = #PSPID# AND XX.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '91', '92') AND XX.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5')
WHEN B.HKONT = '0053037040' THEN (SELECT SUM(TOT) FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN XX.ZZGUBUN = '91' THEN SUM(M.EQME53+M.EQME55+M.EQME58+M.EQME61+M.EQME62+M.EQME63+M.EQME69+M.EQME70+M.EQME68+M.EQME95+M.EQME74) * 100 ELSE SUM(M.EQME53+M.EQME55+M.EQME58+M.EQME61+M.EQME62+M.EQME63+M.EQME69+M.EQME70+M.EQME68+M.EQME95) * 100 END) AS TOT FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS XX ON XX.MANDT = M.MANDT AND XX.POSID = M.PSPID AND XX.POSID_1 = M.POSID WHERE XX.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND XX.POSID = #PSPID# AND XX.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '20', '91', '92') AND XX.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5' GROUP BY XX.ZZGUBUN) ) WHEN B.HKONT = '0053037060' THEN (SELECT SUM(M.EQME56+M.EQME57+M.EQME59+M.EQME60+M.EQME65+M.EQME66+M.EQME96) * 100 FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS XX ON XX.MANDT = M.MANDT AND XX.POSID = M.PSPID AND XX.POSID_1 = M.POSID WHERE XX.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND XX.POSID = #PSPID# AND XX.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '91', '92') AND XX.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5')
WHEN B.HKONT = '0053037050' THEN (SELECT SUM(M.EQME54+M.EQME90+M.EQME100) * 100 FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS XX ON XX.MANDT = M.MANDT AND XX.POSID = M.PSPID AND XX.POSID_1 = M.POSID WHERE XX.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND XX.POSID = #PSPID# AND XX.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '20', '91', '92') AND XX.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5' )
WHEN B.HKONT = '0053037220' THEN (SELECT SUM(M.EQME99) * 100 FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS XX ON XX.MANDT = M.MANDT AND XX.POSID = M.PSPID AND XX.POSID_1 = M.POSID WHERE XX.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND XX.POSID = #PSPID# AND XX.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '91', '92') AND XX.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5' )
WHEN B.HKONT = '0053037070' THEN (SELECT SUM(M.EQME75+M.EQME76+M.EQME77+M.EQME78+M.EQME92+M.EQME93+M.EQME97) * 100 FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS XX ON XX.MANDT = M.MANDT AND XX.POSID = M.PSPID AND XX.POSID_1 = M.POSID WHERE XX.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND XX.POSID = #PSPID# AND XX.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '91', '92') AND XX.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5' )
WHEN B.HKONT = '0053037160' THEN (SELECT SUM(M.EQME96) * 100 FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS XX ON XX.MANDT = M.MANDT AND XX.POSID = M.PSPID AND XX.POSID_1 = M.POSID WHERE XX.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND XX.POSID = #PSPID# AND XX.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '91', '92') AND XX.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5' )
WHEN B.HKONT = '0053037150' THEN (SELECT SUM(TOT) FROM (SELECT (CASE WHEN XX.ZZGUBUN = '91' THEN SUM(M.EQME54+M.EQME90+M.EQME100) * 100 ELSE SUM(M.EQME54+M.EQME100) * 100 END) AS TOT FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS XX ON XX.MANDT = M.MANDT AND XX.POSID = M.PSPID AND XX.POSID_1 = M.POSID WHERE XX.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND XX.POSID = #PSPID# AND XX.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '91', '92') AND XX.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5' GROUP BY XX.ZZGUBUN) )
WHEN B.HKONT = '0053037140' THEN (SELECT SUM(M.EQME53+M.EQME73) * 100 FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS XX ON XX.MANDT = M.MANDT AND XX.POSID = M.PSPID AND XX.POSID_1 = M.POSID WHERE XX.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND XX.POSID = #PSPID# AND XX.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '91', '92') AND XX.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5' )
WHEN B.HKONT = '0053037170' THEN (SELECT SUM(M.EQME97) * 100 FROM SAPHEE.ZCOBT300 AS M INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS XX ON XX.MANDT = M.MANDT AND XX.POSID = M.PSPID AND XX.POSID_1 = M.POSID WHERE XX.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND XX.POSID = #PSPID# AND XX.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '91', '92') AND XX.PRART IN ('01', '11') AND M.DIV = '5' )
ELSE 0 END, 0) AS NETWR, B.ZZACTSS, '' AS T_ITEMTX_PR, '' AS ITEMTX_PR, MT.J_1KFREPRE, MT.MCOD3||' '||MT.STRAS AS ADDR, SUBSTR(B.WRKLFN,1,3)||'-'||SUBSTR(B.WRKLFN,4,2)||'-'||SUBSTR(B.WRKLFN,6) AS WRKLFN_LINE
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0117 AS B INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0117L AS C ON B.MANDT = C.MANDT AND B.PSPID = C.PSPID AND B.HKONT = C.HKONT AND B.GUBUN = C.GUBUN AND B.SEQNO = C.SEQNO
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MA ON MA.MANDT = B.MANDT AND MA.POSID = B.PSPID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS M ON M.MANDT = B.MANDT AND M.POSID = B.PSPID AND M.POSID_1 = B.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS LF ON B.MANDT = LF.MANDT AND B.WRKLFN = LF.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT012 AS MT ON B.MANDT = MT.MANDT AND B.WRKLFN = MT.LIFNR WHERE B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND B.PSPID = #PSPID# AND B.HKONT IN ('0053037050', '0053037040', '0053037210', '0053037040', '0053037060', '0053037050', '0053037220', '0053037070', '0053037160', '0053037150', '0053037140', '0053037170', '0053041050', '0053031070', '0053031080') AND B.GUBUN = '1' AND B.W_INST = 'X'
AND B.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#
AND MA.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
ORDER BY B.PSPID, B.HKONT, B.SEQNO DESC WITH UR
